resources.string: Use the free Color Calculator to try different colors for your project. Choose your base color(s) and color harmony to create a color palette. You’ll get a color chart with hex, RGB, and CMYK color values and see your colors applied to design samples. You’ll be able to immediately evaluate your color choices against real-world design examples. Adjust, share, print, rinse, and repeat. For an explanation of color harmonies (including complementary colors and monochromatic color schemes) continue reading past ‘How to Use the Color Wheel
